main.name: I'm Moshin G.
main.description: Hi ! I am a Subject and Solution Oriented  Web Developer with wide variety of professional experiences. Being expert in both back end and front end development, I have successful working career in both team and self-directed settings
main.bio: I am an freelancer, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for network security, and a passion for coding, I pursued my first development job to kick off my career. I was hired as a full stack developer by Iugale Services Pvt Ltd, where I worked for 1.5 years. Since beginning my career there, I have been given the opportunity to develop websites for clients. I am currently working towards my freelancing career while working as a full stack developer.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science, Software Engineering Option
education.description: I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

I studied Computer Systems Technology, a 3 year lead-in to a Bachelors of Computer Science. This was a very hands-on experience focused more on building projects than general theory. Here I built database structures for fictional companies, developed minor websites,a lot of Java and C++ programming for data structures, and much more.

work.title: Freelance Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: Currently working as a freelance full stack web developer i develop dynamic and reusable design systems. Establish consistency and predictability across the internet. Easy to manage, maintain, share and iterate.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: For most of my time at Iugale Services Pvt Ltd, I have worked as a Full Stack Software Engineer. Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our software. I have worked with our legacy PHP backend, as well as built new node-based servers for new products. As well, I led the development of V2 of our mobile application written in React Native. I have worked extensively with React/Redux as well as with react hooks.
